unnormalised: Campus hiring is crucial for talent acquisition, especially from institutions like IIT Delhi. Our experience at IIM Ahmedabad on 10/07/2024 was very positive. We need to start planning for placements at NIT Trichy by 20/08/2024, targeting 09:00 hrs for interviews. A good strategy is essential to attract candidates like Priya Sharma.
